casebody.data:
Norman JOHNSON, petitioner,
v.
JUST ENERGY. No. 15-6490. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 14, 2015.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until January 4, 2016, within which to pay docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
